name: The Small Regent
description:
The Small Regent - An Orbital Adventure

You are the Small Regent (possibly the smallest?), and one of your friends needs your regal assistance.

Controls

E - Talk

A/D or left arrow/right arrow - Move

Click - Launch Harpoon

Credits

Art - ccpixel (https://ccpixel.itch.io/)

Planets - https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Music - Gymnopedie No. 1 by Erik Satie (performed by Kevin McLeod https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod/Classical_Sampler/Gymnopedie_No...)

Font - Rainy Hearts (by Camellina https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font)

Sound effects

  • Grapple launch - https://freesound.org/people/_def/sounds/346524/
  • Hook - https://freesound.org/people/16bitstudios/sounds/541975/
  • Landing - https://freesound.org/people/joedeshon/sounds/632535/

Inspiration - The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Made with Godot 3.2.4 for the Godot Wild Jam #46
